bibl.title: Tax Receipts, Taxpayers, and Taxes in Early Ptolemaic Thebes. (Oriental Institute Publications. 126.)
bibl.biblScope: tabl., 1 carte et 32 pll. (dont 3 arbres généalogiques).
bibl.note: O. Chic. Or. Inst. 1-61. - 1. The Early Ptolemaic Tax System. - 2. Capitation Taxes before Year 22 of Ptolemy II (332-264 B.C.). - 3. Capitation Taxes after Year 21 of Ptolemy II (264-200 B.C.). - 4. Other State Revenues. - 5. Temple Taxes and Other Revenues. - 6. Prosopography and Provenance. - 7. Catalogue of Early Ptolemaic Ostraca in the Nelson Collection of the Oriental Institute Museum [O. Chic. Or. Inst. 1-61, including a few bilingual (Demotic and Greek) or Greek texts]. - 8. Indices. - Available online (PDF), without charge: < http://oi.uchicago.edu/OI/DEPT/PUB/SRC/OIP/126/OIP126.html >.
